timeline.author: pulasthi7
timeline.diffHunk:

      */
     public enum ErrorMessage {
 
+        // Client errors starting from 600xx.
+        ERROR_CODE_IDP_NOT_FOUND("60002", "Resource not found.", "Unable to find a resource matching the provided " +
+                "identity provider identifier %s."),
         ERROR_CODE_ERROR_LISTING_IDPS("60021",

+                "connector identifier %s."),

replies.bodyText: With the commit, I have rearranged the order of the error codes and I have not changed the content. This was an existing issue. I think we cannot change the error codes now.
replies.author: somindatommy

replies.bodyText: Let's change this. It would be still fine than proceeding this way
replies.author: pulasthi7

timeline.message: Refactoring Error constants as server error and client errors
